lead_paragraph: CORROON--Constance, of Rye, NY died on April 24th. She was the daughter of Florence and Stephen V. Duffy. She is survived by her husband Lawrence and two children, Claire and Daniel. She was predeceased by her daughter Anne Grubbs and siblings Joseph Duffy, Miriam Scavullo, Rev. Stephen Duffy SJ, Sr. Helen Marie SSND, Rev. Edwin Duffy, Florence Doherty and Jane Burt. Mrs. Corroon attended the Convent of Scared Heart 91st Street and graduated from Manhattanville College of the Scared Heart. A funeral mass will be celebrated on Saturday, April 30, at 11am at the Church of the Resurrection, 910 Boston Post Road, Rye, NY. Donations to Hospice of Westchester, 1025 Westchester Ave., White Plains, NY 10604 would be appreciated. 1/3
